AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks whether auditing is running or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqgated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for gated: Checks whether the system is configured to be a router or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks the herald value is set or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry eixsts or not in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_filecp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Backup the key system files prior to lockdown

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of chars: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4, that were not in the old password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 8

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Specifies the number of weeks to 13 weeks, before a password can be reused

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum times a char can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse time: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot resuse to 20

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum number of weeks to 2 weeks, after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Specifies the minimum number of lower case alphabetic characters in a password to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Specifies the minimum number of upper case alphabetic characters in a password to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_lpa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets the LPA to ssha256

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Interval between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the time interval(300 seconds) for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port to 10, before the port is locked

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval(360 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval(30 seconds) to type in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 10 seconds

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 3, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remote root login: Disables remote root login

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_sysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Lockdown access to the generic system accounnts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: "chuser login=false rlogin=false daemon; chuser login=false rlogin=false bin; chuser login=false rlogin=false sys; chuser login=false rlogin=false adm; chuser login=false rlogin=false uucp; chuser login=false rlogin=false nobody; chuser login=false rlogin=false lpd"

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disqdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable qdaemon: Stops qdaemon and comments the qdaemon entry in /etc/inittab

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments the lpd entry in /etc/inittab

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dispiobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable piobe daemon: Stops piobe daemon and comments the piobe entry in/etc/inittab

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_discde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable CDE: Disables CDE when LFT is not configured

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dismaildmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable mail client:Stops Sendmail daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable SNMP daemon: Stops SNMP daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_hostmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable hostmibd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_snmpmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable snmpmibd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_aixmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable aixmibd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable telnet: Comments the entry for telnetd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of telnetd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rexecd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rexecd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP Daytime service in /etc/inetd.confand kills all instances of daytime(tcp)

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP Daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rshd daemon: Comments the entry for rshd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd service

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver service

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_uucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable uucpd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for uucpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of uucpd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP Time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of timed(tcp)

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP Time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of time service(udp)

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rlogin in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rlogind daemonin /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable talk in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for talk daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable ntalk in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable FTP: Comments the entry for ftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ftpd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disrmtcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure commands: Disables unsecure commands rlogin, rsh, rcp and tftp

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disrmtdmns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure daemons: Disables unsecure daemons rlogind, rshd, and tftpd

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove rhosts and netrc services: Removes .rhosts and .netrc files from user's home directory

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file: Removes entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disablenfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stop NFS daemon: Removes NFS mounts, stops NFS daemons and removes NFS from startup

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcrouteforward: Set network option ipsrcrouteforward's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipignoreredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipignoreredirects: Set network option ipignoreredirects's value to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option clean_partial_conns: Set network option clean_partial_conns's value to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcroutesend: Set network option ipsrcroutesend's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipforwarding: Set network option ipforwarding's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsendredirects: Set network option ipsendredirects's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ip6srcrouteforward: Set network option ip6srcrouteforward's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_directed_broadcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option directed_broadcast: Set network option directed_broadcast's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_pmtu_discover: Set network option tcp_pmtu_discover's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option bcastping: Set network option bcastping's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_icmpaddressmask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option icmpaddressmask: Set network option icmpaddressmask's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_udp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option udp_pmtu_discover: Set network option udp_pmtu_discover's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcrouterecv: Set network option ipsrcrouterecv's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option nonlocsrcroute: Set network option nonlocsrcroute's value to 0

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set network option tcp_tcpsecure's value to 7

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_sockthresh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option sockthresh: Set network option sockthresh's value to 60

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rfc1323
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option rfc1323: Set network option rfc1323's value to 1

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcp_sendspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_sendspace: Set network option tcp_sendspace's value to 262144

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcp_recvspace
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_recvspace: Set network option tcp_recvspace's value to 262144

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tcp_mssdflt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_mssdflt: Set network option tcp_mssdflt's value to 1448

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Limit system access: Makes root the only user in cron.allow file and removes the cron.deny file

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_at
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Limit access to the at command

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Add root user in /etc/ftpusers file: Adds root username in /etc/ftpusers file

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_loginherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set login herald: Set login herald in default stanza

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_removeguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove guest account: Removes guest account and its files

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_crontabperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Crontab permissions: Ensures root's crontab jobs are owned and writable only by root

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Object creation permissions: Specifies default object creation permissions to 077

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_core
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable core dumps
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: "chsec -f /etc/security/limits -s default -a core=0 -a core_hard=0; chdev -l sys0 -a fullcore=false"

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_binaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable binaudit: Enables bin auditing for HLS

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disrtngdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable routing daemon: Stops routed daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dismrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable mrouted daemon: Stops mrouted daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_distimedmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable timed daemon: Stops timed daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disdhcpagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stop DHCP Agent: Stops DHCP relay agent and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disdhcpserv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stop DHCP Server: Stops DHCP server daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disautoconf6
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stop autoconf6: Stops autoconf6, if it is running and comments the entry for autoconf6 in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disgateddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable gated daemon: Stops gated daemons and comments the entry for gated daemon in /etc/rc.tcpip if the system is not configured as a router

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disdnsdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DNS daemon: Stops DNS daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disdhcpclient
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stop DHCP Client: Stops DHCP client and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ndpd_host
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stops ndpd-host daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_ndpd_router
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stops ndpd-router daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_chargen_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the chargen service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_chargen_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the chargen service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_discard_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the discard service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_discard_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the discard service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_echo_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the echo service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_echo_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the echo service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_dtspc_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the dtspc service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_pcnfsd_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the pcnfsd service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rstatd_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the rstatd service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rusersd_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the rusersd service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rwalld_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the rwalld service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_rquotad_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the rquotad service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_tftp_udp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the tftp service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_sprayd_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the sprayd service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_klogin_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the klogin service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_kshell_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the kshell service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_imap2_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the imap2 service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_pop3_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the pop3 service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_finger_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the finger service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_instsrv_tcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disables the instsrv service commenting the entry in /etc/inetd.conf

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_inittab_perm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set recommended mode and owner on /etc/inittab

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_suroot_grp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets up a root sugroup - system

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_nfs_port
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set NFS reserved ports
